member.name: F:ShopTools.frmCutEdit.btnCancel
member.summary: Cancel button. Click this button to cancel any changes you have made while creating or editing your cut.

member.summary: OK button. Click this button to save the changes to your new or updated cut.

member.remarks: The cut editing form presents an object-based properties grid for handling all of the user settings.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmMain.btnDeleteCut
member.summary: Delete Cut button. Delete the selected cut or cuts.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmMain.btnDuplicateCut
member.summary: Duplicate Cut button. Duplicate the selected cut or cuts, appending the new cuts at the bottom of the list.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmMain.btnEditCut
member.summary: Edit Cut button. Edit the selected cut.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmMain.btnGO
member.summary: GO button. Not yet implemented.

remarks.para: Clicking this button will start the operation on the locally configured machine.
However, this button is currently disabled until communications ports have been implemented.
For the time-being, please export cut lists to g-code and send them through your favorite g-code sender.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmMain.btnStop
member.summary: Stop bottom. Not yet implemented.

remarks.para: Clicking this button will immediately stop the operation on the locally configured machine.
However, this button is currently disabled until communications ports have been implemented.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmMain.cmboWorkpieceX
member.summary: Drop down list containing choices for X-axis alignment of the workpiece on the canvas.

list.item: From Left. The workpiece is aligned to the left side of the canvas.
Left Edge To Center. The left edge of the workpiece is aligned to the center of the canvas.
Center To Center. The center of the workpiece is aligned to the center of the canvas.
Right Edge To Center. The right edge of the workpiece is aligned to the center of the canvas.
From Right. The right edge of the workpiece is aligned to the right side of the canvas.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmMain.cmboWorkpieceY
member.summary: Drop down list containing choices for Y-axis alignment of the workpiece on the canvas.

list.item: From Top. The top edge of the workpiece is aligned to the top of the canvas.
Top Edge To Center. The top edge of the workpiece is aligned to the center of the canvas.
Center To Center. The center of the workpiece is aligned to the center of the canvas.
Bottom Edge To Center. The bottom edge of the workpiece is aligned to the center of the canvas.
From Bottom. The bottom edge of the workpiece is aligned to the bottom of the canvas.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.btnCancel
member.summary: Cancel button. Cancels changes to the settings and closes the dialog box, returning to the calling form.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.btnEditTools
member.summary: Edit Tools button. Opens frmEditTools.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.btnOK
member.summary: OK button. Saves changes to configuration settings and closes the dialog box, returning to the calling form.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.chkXOpenEnded
member.summary: X is open-ended checkbox.
member.remarks: This value indicates whether the canvas is open-ended along the X-axis, allowing for a potentially infinite feed.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.chkYOpenEnded
member.summary: Y is open-ended checkbox.
member.remarks: This value indicates whether the canvas is open-ended along the Y-axis, allowing for a potentially infinite feed.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.cmboGeneralCuttingTool
member.summary: Drop down list for selecting the default tool.
member.remarks: This control contains the list of user-defined tools, one of which can be selected to serve as the general tool to be used implicitly when no tool has been explicitly selected for a cut.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.cmboXYOrigin
member.summary: Drop down list for selecting the X/Y origin of the canvas.

list.item: Center. The origin is in the center of the table.
Top. The origin is at the top center of the table.
Top Left. The origin is at the top left corner of the table.
Left. The origin is at the left center of the table.
Bottom Left. The origin is at the bottom left corner of the table.
Bottom. The origin is at the bottom center of the table.
Bottom Right. The origin is at the bottom right corner of the table.
Right. The origin is at the right center of the table.
Top Right. The origin is at the top right corner of the table.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.cmboZOrigin
member.summary: Drop down list for selecting the Z origin of the canvas.

list.item: Top. The origin is at the top of the Z range, furthest from the table.
Center. The origin is in the center of the Z range.
Bottom. The origin is at the bottom of the Z range, closest to the table.

member.summary: General Cutting title label.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.lblZOrigin
member.summary: Z Origin title label.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.optMetric
member.summary: Metric (mm, cm, m) radio button.

remarks.para: Selecting this option has two effects.

list.item: Metric values are displayed in all alternate unit labels accompanying a measurement textbox.
When no unit of measurement is specified for a measurement textbox, that number is assumed to be millimeters.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.optUS
member.summary: U.S. (in, ft, ', ") radio button.

remarks.para: Selecting this option has two effects.

list.item: US decimal values are displayed in all alternate unit labels accompanying a measurement textbox.
When no unit of measurement is specified for a measurement textbox, that number is assumed to be inches.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.optXPLeft
member.summary: X+ Left radio button.
member.remarks: This option indicates that the value of X increases in a leftward direction.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.optXPRight
member.summary: X+ Right radio button.
member.remarks: This option indicates that the value of X increases in a rightward direction.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.optYPDown
member.summary: Y+ Down radio button.
member.remarks: This option indicates that the value of Y increases in a downward direction.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.optYPUp
member.summary: Y+ Up radio button.
member.remarks: This option indicates that the value of Y increases in an upward direction.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.optZPDown
member.summary: Z+ Down radio button.
member.remarks: This option indicates that the value of Z increases in a downward direction.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.optZPUp
member.summary: Z+ Up radio button.
member.remarks: This option indicates that the value of Z increases in an upward direction.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.pnlCanvasArea
member.summary: Panel control in the general shape of the working table canvas, according to the current dimensions and origin.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.pnlTravelX
member.summary: Container for the X+ Travel options.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.pnlTravelY
member.summary: Container for the Y+ Travel options.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.pnlTravelZ
member.summary: Container for the Z+ Travel options.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.pnlUnits
member.summary: Container for the Display Units options.

member.name: F:ShopTools.frmSettings.txtSystemSummary
member.summary: Written summary description of the current configuration of dimensions and origin.
